channel.title: Visual Studio - Tag - MAUI, c'est clair !
channel.description: Visual Studio - Tag - MAUI, c'est clair !

item.title: Target multiple environments in .NET MAUI
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: To validate new features in your application, it is best to test them in an isolated environment. This will prevent any risk of data loss from your users. In this document, you will learn how to set up different environments for your mobile application.

item.title: Create a .NET MAUI App without Shell
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Since the official release of .NET MAUI, it is not possible to create a new project where Visual Studio does not add a default Shell. Fortunately, there is a very simple way to get rid of it!

item.title: Media playback controls
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: More and more buttons! In this chapter, we will integrate the controls for manipulating the media.

item.title: First run of the project
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: It's now time to get the app running. We'll also take the opportunity to look at the source code ðŸ™‚
